About.paragraph: Whether you are running a small, medium or large scale business, we train participants on knowledge required to successfully startup abd run a business as well as to seek and get fundings for the enterprise.

HomeScreen.paragraph: Whether you are running a small, medium or large scale business, we take care of your finances, operations, and more at Orchiddigital Consulting Limited.

Services.name: ACCESS TO MARKET:
Services.text: We connect bulk purchasers for your products and services, we sell your goods and services across borders and enter foreign markets..

Services.name: AGRO CONSULTING:
Services.text: We specialize in advising, provide technical, commercial and financial advice and information to farming, agricultural and public sector. .

Services.name: EXPORT OF RAW MATERIALS
Services.text: We move goods and services from the country to other countries to be purchased, this saves a lot of cost for you and gives you more ...                                                  .

Services.name: ENTREPRENUERSHIP TRAINING:
Services.text: It is a training scheme to develop persons for self employment or for organizing, financing and managing new ventures or businesses....

Services.name: FACILITY MANAGEMENT:
Services.text: We co-ordinate everything that keeps a business; physical buildings, systems and assets running...

Services.name: INSURANCE /AUDIT AND TAX CLEARANCE:

Services.name: ENTERPRISE MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT /MAINTENANCE:

Services.name: ACCESS TO FINANCE
Services.text: We provide financial services through commercial banks private financial institution, CBN NIRSAL MFB, CBN Microfinance for start ups and expanding business..
